description: Controlled test data for E2E tests. System roles/groups are auto-discovered. These custom resources are created with TEST_PREFIX for deterministic testing.

roles.name: Seeded_Role
roles.description: Controlled test role for search and view tests

groups.name: Seeded_Group
groups.description: Controlled test group for search and view tests

workspaces.name: Seeded_Workspace
workspaces.description: Controlled test workspace for V2 tests
